member.name: T:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contains different extensions of the string type

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string into a hash code by a certain logic
member.returns: the string converted into hash code

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if one of the words in the array below is present in the current string

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to convert a value of type string into a value of type short (tries to parse string into short)
member.returns: in case of success: the string value converted into short; in case of fail in parsing: the default value of short i.e. 0

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to convert a string into an integer
member.returns: in case of success: the string value converted into int; in case of fail in parsing: the default value of int i.e. 0

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to convert a string into an integer number of type long
member.returns: in case of success: the string value converted into long; in case of fail in parsing: the default value of long i.e. 0

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to convert a string value into a value of time DateTime
member.returns: in case of fail in parsing: the default value of DateTime i.e. 01-Jan-01 12:00:00 AM

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to make the first letter of a string capital
member.returns: if the string we check is null or empty: the string we are checking; if the string is not null or empty: capitalizes the first letter of the string

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the string between two separate strings in the string value we check
member.param: the first string that is supposed to be a part of the string we check
the seconds string that is supposed to be a part of the string we check
the start position from which we began to search the first string
member.returns: the string between the two strings we give to the method; in case of fail: string.Empty

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts cyrillic letters to latin letters
member.returns: the converted string which consists of latin letters

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts latin letters to cyrillic letters according to the keyboard
member.returns: the string converted into cyrillic letters

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the cyrillic letters with latin letters and converts the string into a valid user name according to a certain logic. The logic simply removes characters different than all latin letters, all numbers and the "_" and "." symbols
member.returns: the string converted into a valid user name

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the cyrillic letters with latin letters and the single whitespaces with the "-" symbol. Converts the string into a valid file name written with latin letters
member.returns: the string converted into a valid latin file name

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters of the string
member.param: the number of characters we want to get from the beginning of the string
member.returns: a substring from the string we manipulate or the whole string in case the charsCount argument is less than the length of the string

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the extesion of the file name
member.returns: in case of success: the string after the last "." symbol; in case of fail: string.Empty

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a file extesion into content type

member.name: M:_01.StringExtensions.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string into an array of bytes
